original_text: And thou shalt put them into one basket, and bring them in the basket, with the bullock and the two rams.
korean_text: 그것들을 한 광주리에 담고 그것을 광주리에 담은 채 그 송아지와 두 양과 함께 가져오라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt put them into one basket
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그것들을 한 바구니에 넣을지니라

sentences.original_text: and bring them in the basket
with the bullock and two rams
